SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.decks

Class Deck<TCard extends Card>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.decks.Deck<TCard>
public class Deck<TCard extends Card> extends Object
A generic class that represents a deck of Card objects, with basic operation of a deck (shuffle, draw, ecc...).

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final RandomDealer<TCard>
    dealer
    The functionality of the deck are delegated to this private instance of the random dealer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Deck(List<TCard> cards)
    Create a new deck that handles the passed list of cards.
    Deck(List<TCard> cards, int seed)
    Create a new deck that handles the passed list of cards, with a specified seed for the random generator.

      Create a new deck that handles the passed list of cards.
      Parameters:
      cards - The cards of this deck.

    • Deck

      public Deck(List<TCard> cards, int seed)
      Create a new deck that handles the passed list of cards, with a specified seed for the random generator.
      Parameters:
      cards - The cards of this deck.
      seed - The seed of the random generator.

  • Method Details

    • getStarterCardsDeck

      public static Deck<StarterCard> getStarterCardsDeck()
      Returns:
      A new deck with all Starter cards. The cards are sorted as listed in the ref. manual. Call shuffle() to shuffle the cards.

    • getStarterCardsDeck

      public static Deck<StarterCard> getStarterCardsDeck(int seed)
      This method takes an integer value to be used for the random generator, so that the cards in the deck are always in the same order ofter being shuffled.
      Parameters:
      seed - The seed of the random generator.
      Returns:
      A new deck with all Starter cards, with a specified seed for the random generator. The cards are sorted as listed in the ref. manual. Call shuffle() to shuffle the cards.

    • getGoldCardsDeck

      public static Deck<GoldCard> getGoldCardsDeck()
      Returns:
      A new deck with all Gold cards. The cards are sorted as listed in the ref. manual. Call shuffle() to shuffle the cards.

    • getGoldCardsDeck

      public static Deck<GoldCard> getGoldCardsDeck(int seed)
      This method takes an integer value to be used for the random generator, so that the cards in the deck are always in the same order ofter being shuffled.
      Parameters:
      seed - The seed of the random generator.
      Returns:
      A new deck with all Gold cards, with a specified seed for the random generator. The cards are sorted as listed in the ref. manual. Call shuffle() to shuffle the cards.

    • getResourceCardsDeck

      public static Deck<ResourceCard> getResourceCardsDeck()
      Returns:
      A new deck with all Resource cards. The cards are sorted as listed in the ref. manual. Call shuffle() to shuffle the cards.

    • getResourceCardsDeck

      public static Deck<ResourceCard> getResourceCardsDeck(int seed)
      This method takes an integer value to be used for the random generator, so that the cards in the deck are always in the same order ofter being shuffled.
      Parameters:
      seed - The seed of the random generator.
      Returns:
      A new deck with all Resource cards, with a specified seed for the random generator. The cards are sorted as listed in the ref. manual. Call shuffle() to shuffle the cards.

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Shuffle the deck. All cards of the deck become available, and they are sorted in random order.

    • draw

      public TCard draw() throws IllegalStateException
      Returns:
      The card drawn from the deck.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If there are no more cards in the deck.

    • peekCard

      public TCard peekCard() throws DeckException
      Return the next card of the deck (if present), but does not remove that card from the deck.
      Returns:
      The next card of the deck.
      Throws:
      DeckException - If there are no more cards in the deck.

    • cardsCount

      public int cardsCount()
      Returns:
      The count of remaining cards in the deck.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Returns:
      True if there are no more cards in the deck.
